EN.title: Implementing Auto Refresh on AVEVA InTouch Alarm Database Viewer
EN.description: Learn how to implement automatic refresh functionality for the Alarm Database Viewer in AVEVA InTouch SCADA systems to improve monitoring efficiency.
EN.author: Fajar Yuda Pratama

ID.title: Implementasi Auto Refresh pada Alarm Database Viewer AVEVA InTouch
ID.description: Pelajari cara mengimplementasikan fitur refresh otomatis untuk Alarm Database Viewer di sistem SCADA AVEVA InTouch untuk meningkatkan efisiensi monitoring.
ID.author: Fajar Yuda Pratama
